comments: Capela (ATL) makes contact with Ayton's (POR) wrist, which affects the release of his jump shot attempt.
Krejci's (ATL) arms come out slightly as he firms up in Camara's (POR) path and marginal contact occurs as Camara moves into the pick.

Ayton (POR) raises his arm toward the loose ball when he grazes the side of Capela's (ATL) head during the rebounding opportunity. Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Murray (POR) extends his right arm out and makes contact with Capela's (ATL) left forearm, which alters Capela's shot attempt at the basket.
Capela (ATL) rests and removes his hand from Murray's (POR) right arm and the contact prior to the release of the pass is marignal.
Bogdanovic (ATL) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Capela's (ATL) hand lightly brushes Simons' (POR) side after his gather and the contact during the driving floater attempt is marginal.
Thybulle (POR) rests his forearm on Murray's (ATL) side and removes the marginal contact during Murray's driving shot attempt.
Capela (ATL) hooks and pulls Ayton's (POR) right arm, which impacts his ability to secure the loose ball.
Thybulle (POR) makes clean contact with the ball and legally blocks Bogdanovic's (ATL) jump shot attempt.
Simons (POR) hooks his off-arm around Murray's (ATL) arm and pulls it towards his body after the gather, compromising Murray's defensive positioning during the driving shot attempt.
Camara (POR) is trailing Bogdanovic (ATL) when he comes together with Murray (ATL) at the same spot on the floor and the contact is marginal.
Murray (ATL) and Camara (POR) come together at the same spot on  the floor and the contact is marginal.
Murray (ATL) commits a take foul on Ayton (POR).
Hunter (ATL) briefly grasps Camara's (POR) right arm as Camara retrieves the rebound.
Camara (POR) releases the ball prior to coming down out of bounds.
Krejci (ATL) commits a take foul on Simons (POR).
Murray (ATL) stops his forward momentum as he runs toward the backcourt during the inbound and marginal contact occurs as Thybulle (POR) comes to, rather than through, Murray's space.
Capela (ATL) firms up in Murray's (POR) path and does not deliver illegal contact when setting the screen.
Murray (POR) legally contests Bogdanovic's (ATL) jump shot attempt.
